title: Decent Black Watch Face
summary: Virtuous is a righteous Single Hand watch face for Moto 360,LG G Watch R & other

Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Virtuous Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. descriptionHTML:
Model Number
EF-A01

Category
Decent

Product description

Virtuous is a righteous Single Hand watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

 Light & Dark Theme
 Date
 square & round watches support
 Custom Ambient Mode
 Collection of ambient modes Pack

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/102084729733615241293
It has following features

Features:

 Light & Dark Theme
 Date
 square & round watches support
 Custom Ambient Mode
 Collection of ambient modes Pack
Configuration:
 pick your favorite theme (light or dark)
 pick your favorite ambient mode

For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Virtuous Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Decent face but my god, please stop with the constant review request notification. For that reason alone I'm dropping 2 stars.
It crashes every time. It crashes on both of my Moto 360s.
Don't even use it, but constant push notifications asking to rate 5 stars
Crashed as soon as it opens
Works nicely, battery is not getting drained. Happy days :)
